message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I think it's a great fit for you. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9,000. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counteroffer at $8,500.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm not willing to go as low as $8,500. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell the product to you for $9,500. What do you think?
I understand your position, Alice. I am willing to pay $9,000 for the product. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm not willing to sell the product for $9,000. I'm willing to compromise and sell it to you for $9,200. This is my final offer as well.
Considering your last offer, I am willing to pay $9,100 for the product. This is my final offer.
I'm getting close to accepting your offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to sell the product for $9,100. I'm willing to meet you at $9,150. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Considering our previous discussions, I am willing to pay $9,125 for the product. This is my final offer.
I'm not willing to go any higher than $9,150, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $9,125 and $9,150, so I'll sell the product to you for $9,137.50. This is my final offer.
Considering the value of the product and our previous negotiations, I am willing to pay $9,130 for the product. This is my final offer.
